location.zh-cn: 莫斯科, 亚历山佐夫, 圣彼得堡

description.zh-cn: 1547年至1721年间俄罗斯的国号，始于伊凡四世加冕为沙皇，终于彼得大帝改国号为俄罗斯帝国。
description.en: The official name of the Russian state from 1547 until 1721, beginning with Ivan IV's coronation as Tsar and ending with Peter the Great's renaming of the state to the Russian Empire.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯沙皇国首位沙皇，以其独裁统治和复杂的个性而闻名，被称为“雷帝”。
description.en: The first Tsar of the Tsardom of Russia, known for his autocratic rule and complex personality, earning him the nickname 'the Terrible'.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯沙皇国的末代沙皇，通过广泛的改革将俄国现代化，并建立了俄罗斯帝国。
description.en: The last Tsar of the Tsardom of Russia, who modernized Russia through extensive reforms and established the Russian Empire.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯统治者使用的头衔，源自拉丁文“凯撒”，象征着至高无上的君主专制权力。
description.en: A title used by Russian rulers, derived from the Latin 'Caesar', symbolizing supreme autocratic power.

description.zh-cn: 由彼得大帝建立，继承俄罗斯沙皇国的国家。
description.en: The state that succeeded the Tsardom of Russia, founded by Peter the Great.

description.zh-cn: 彼得大帝采用的头衔，标志着俄罗斯沙皇国向俄罗斯帝国的转变。
description.en: The title adopted by Peter the Great, marking the transition from the Tsardom of Russia to the Russian Empire.

description.zh-cn: 一种地缘政治和宗教思想，宣称莫斯科是罗马帝国和拜占庭帝国的合法继承者，成为东正教世界的中心。
description.en: A geopolitical and religious concept claiming Moscow as the legitimate successor to the Roman and Byzantine Empires, becoming the center of the Orthodox Christian world.

description.zh-cn: 莫斯科大公，通过与拜占庭公主索菲娅·巴列奥略的婚姻，为后来的“第三罗马”思想奠定了基础。
description.en: Grand Prince of Moscow, whose marriage to the Byzantine princess Sophia Palaiologina laid the groundwork for the later 'Third Rome' ideology.

description.zh-cn: 拜占庭帝国的末代公主，伊凡三世的妻子。
description.en: The last princess of the Byzantine Empire and wife of Ivan III.

description.zh-cn: 被俄罗斯沙皇国视为“第二罗马”，其文化、礼仪和标志对沙皇国影响深远。
description.en: Considered the 'Second Rome' by the Tsardom of Russia, its culture, ceremonies, and symbols had a profound influence on the Tsardom.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯的主要宗教组织，在政治和文化上对沙皇国具有重要影响力。
description.en: The main religious organization in Russia, holding significant political and cultural influence over the Tsardom.

description.zh-cn: 东正教牧首，明确提出“莫斯科是第三个罗马”思想的理论家。
description.en: An Orthodox Patriarch and theorist who explicitly articulated the idea of 'Moscow as the Third Rome'.

description.zh-cn: 东罗马帝国首都的陷落，被视为俄罗斯宣称“第三罗马”地位的历史契机。
description.en: The fall of the capital of the Byzantine Empire, seen as the historical opportunity for Russia to claim the status of the 'Third Rome'.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯沙皇，曾与彼得大帝共同执政。
description.en: Tsar of Russia, who co-ruled with Peter the Great.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯历史上一段政治混乱、外敌入侵和王位争夺的时期，最终以罗曼诺夫王朝的建立而结束。
description.en: A period in Russian history of political chaos, foreign invasion, and succession crises, which ended with the establishment of the Romanov dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯沙皇，被怀疑秘密杀害了王位继承人季米特里。
description.en: Tsar of Russia, suspected of secretly murdering the heir to the throne, Dmitry.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯沙皇，伊凡四世之子。
description.en: Tsar of Russia, son of Ivan IV.

nodes.id: 德米特里·伊万诺维奇 (乌格里奇)

zh-cn: 德米特里·伊万诺维奇 (乌格里奇)

description.zh-cn: 伊凡四世之子，有王位继承权，于1591年被秘密杀害。
description.en: Son of Ivan IV and heir to the throne, who was secretly murdered in 1591.

description.zh-cn: 在混乱时期冒充被杀的季米特里并一度登上沙皇皇位的骗子。
description.en: An imposter who claimed to be the murdered Dmitry during the Time of Troubles and briefly ascended to the tsardom.

description.zh-cn: 波兰国王，在俄罗斯混乱时期支持伪季米特里并试图控制俄罗斯王位。
description.en: King of Poland who supported False Dmitry and attempted to control the Russian throne during the Time of Troubles.

description.zh-cn: 鲍里斯·戈东诺夫之子，在位时间短暂即被伪德米特里一世的支持者杀害。
description.en: Son of Boris Godunov, whose brief reign was ended by his murder at the hands of False Dmitry I's supporters.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯大贵族，领导推翻了伪德米特里一世并成为沙皇。
description.en: A Russian nobleman who led the overthrow of False Dmitry I and became Tsar.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯的封建等级代表会议，在1613年选举米哈伊尔·罗曼诺夫为沙皇，结束了混乱时期。
description.en: A feudal assembly of estates in Russia, which elected Michael Romanov as Tsar in 1613, ending the Time of Troubles.

description.zh-cn: 被全俄罗斯缙绅会议选为沙皇，开创了罗曼诺夫王朝。
description.en: Elected Tsar by the Zemsky Sobor, founding the Romanov dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 统治俄罗斯的第二个也是最后一个王朝。
description.en: The second and last dynasty to rule over Russia.

description.zh-cn: 17世纪与俄罗斯沙皇国在东欧争夺影响力的主要对手。
description.en: A major rival of the Tsardom of Russia for influence in Eastern Europe during the 17th century.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯与波兰立陶宛联邦之间为争夺乌克兰控制权而进行的战争。
description.en: A conflict between Russia and the Polish–Lithuanian Commonwealth over control of Ukraine.

description.zh-cn: 乌克兰哥萨克领袖，寻求俄罗斯的保护，促成了《佩列亚斯拉夫条约》的签订。
description.en: A Ukrainian Cossack leader who sought Russian protection, leading to the signing of the Treaty of Pereyaslav.

nodes.id: 阿列克谢·米哈伊洛维奇·罗曼诺夫

zh-cn: 阿列克谢·米哈伊洛维奇·罗曼诺夫

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯沙皇，接受了博格丹·赫梅利尼茨基的请求，将乌克兰纳入俄罗斯的保护之下。
description.en: Tsar of Russia who accepted Bohdan Khmelnytsky's request to bring Ukraine under Russian protection.

description.zh-cn: 乌克兰哥萨克与俄罗斯沙皇签订的条约，标志着乌克兰开始并入俄罗斯势力范围。
description.en: A treaty signed between the Ukrainian Cossacks and the Tsar of Russia, marking the beginning of Ukraine's incorporation into the Russian sphere of influence.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯在16至17世纪向东扩张，最终将西伯利亚纳入其版图的历史进程。
description.en: The historical process of Russia's eastward expansion during the 16th and 17th centuries, which resulted in the incorporation of Siberia into its territory.

description.zh-cn: 富有的俄罗斯商人家族，在俄国征服西伯利亚的早期阶段起到了关键的推动作用。
description.en: A wealthy Russian merchant family that played a key role in promoting the early stages of the Russian conquest of Siberia.

nodes.id: 叶尔马克·齐莫菲叶维奇

zh-cn: 叶尔马克·齐莫菲叶维奇

description.zh-cn: 哥萨克领袖，受斯特罗加诺夫家族雇佣，开启了对西伯利亚汗国的征服。
description.en: A Cossack leader who, hired by the Stroganov family, began the conquest of the Khanate of Sibir.

description.zh-cn: 位于西西伯利亚的鞑靼汗国，后被俄罗斯征服。
description.en: A Tatar khanate located in southwestern Siberia, which was later conquered by Russia.

description.zh-cn: 中国的最后一个封建王朝，在17世纪与向东扩张的俄罗斯沙皇国发生接触和冲突。
description.en: The last imperial dynasty of China, which came into contact and conflict with the eastward-expanding Tsardom of Russia in the 17th century.

description.zh-cn: 清朝皇帝，与俄罗斯沙皇国签订了《尼布楚条约》，划定了两国边界。
description.en: Emperor of the Qing dynasty who signed the Treaty of Nerchinsk with the Tsardom of Russia, defining the border between the two states.

description.zh-cn: 清朝与俄罗斯沙皇国签订的第一个边界条约，解决了两国在黑龙江流域的冲突。
description.en: The first border treaty signed between the Qing dynasty and the Tsardom of Russia, resolving their conflict in the Amur River basin.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯沙皇国的前身。
description.en: The predecessor state to the Tsardom of Russia.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古族的一支，其汗国在衰落后被俄罗斯吞并。
description.en: A group of Mongol people whose khanate was annexed by Russia after its decline.

description.zh-cn: 伊凡四世在1547年1月16日加冕为沙皇，建立了俄罗斯沙皇国。
description.en: Ivan IV was crowned Tsar on January 16, 1547, establishing the Tsardom of Russia.

description.zh-cn: 彼得大帝将国号改为俄罗斯帝国，结束了俄罗斯沙皇国的历史。
description.en: Peter the Great changed the state's name to the Russian Empire, ending the history of the Tsardom of Russia.

description.zh-cn: 彼得大帝在1721年10月22日成立俄罗斯帝国。
description.en: Peter the Great founded the Russian Empire on October 22, 1721.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯沙皇国由莫斯科公国发展而来。
description.en: The Tsardom of Russia developed from the Grand Duchy of Moscow.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯帝国继承了俄罗斯沙皇国的领土和政治遗产。
description.en: The Russian Empire inherited the territory and political legacy of the Tsardom of Russia.

description.zh-cn: 伊凡三世与拜占庭末代公主索菲娅·巴列奥略成婚，此举加强了莫斯科作为拜占庭继承者的地位。
description.en: Ivan III married the last Byzantine princess, Sophia Palaiologina, a move that strengthened Moscow's claim as the successor to Byzantium.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯沙皇国（莫斯科朝廷）引入了拜占庭的词汇、礼仪、官员头衔和标志（如双头鹰），并以“第三罗马”自居。
description.en: The Tsardom of Russia (the Moscow court) adopted Byzantine vocabulary, ceremonies, official titles, and symbols (like the double-headed eagle), considering itself the 'Third Rome'.

description.zh-cn: 君士坦丁堡的陷落被认为是俄罗斯沙皇宣称自己是罗马与拜占庭帝国合法继承者、莫斯科是“第三罗马”的契机。
description.en: The Fall of Constantinople was seen as the opportune moment for the Russian Tsar to claim to be the legitimate successor to the Roman and Byzantine Empires, and Moscow as the 'Third Rome'.

description.zh-cn: 声明俄罗斯沙皇是罗马与拜占庭帝国唯一的合法继承者，而莫斯科是“第三个罗马”。
description.en: Declared that the Russian Tsar was the only legitimate successor to the Roman and Byzantine Empires, and that Moscow was the 'Third Rome'.

relationships.target: 德米特里·伊万诺维奇 (乌格里奇)

description.zh-cn: 鲍里斯·戈东诺夫被怀疑于1591年秘密杀害了有王位继承权的季米特里。
description.en: Boris Godunov is suspected of having secretly murdered Dmitry, the heir to the throne, in 1591.

description.zh-cn: 混乱时期是俄罗斯沙皇国的一段政治危机、社会动荡和外敌入侵时期，严重削弱了国家。
description.en: The Time of Troubles was a period of political crisis, social upheaval, and foreign invasion for the Tsardom of Russia, which severely weakened the state.

description.zh-cn: 波兰国王齐格蒙特三世支持了自称是季米特里的伪德米特里一世。
description.en: King Sigismund III of Poland supported False Dmitry I, who claimed to be Dmitry.

description.zh-cn: 1605年，在伪德米特里一世夺取政权的过程中，鲍里斯·戈东诺夫的儿子费奥多尔二世被杀。
description.en: In 1605, during False Dmitry I's seizure of power, Feodor II, the son of Boris Godunov, was killed.

description.zh-cn: 在大贵族瓦西里·舒伊斯基的率领下，伪德米特里一世因其亲波兰政策被杀。
description.en: Led by the nobleman Vasili Shuisky, False Dmitry I was killed due to his pro-Polish policies.

description.zh-cn: 1610年，波兰军队攻占莫斯科，沙皇瓦西里·舒伊斯基被杀。
description.en: In 1610, Polish troops captured Moscow, and Tsar Vasili Shuisky was killed.

description.zh-cn: 1613年，全俄罗斯缙绅会议宣布立米哈伊尔·罗曼诺夫为沙皇，结束了混乱时期。
description.en: In 1613, the Zemsky Sobor proclaimed Michael Romanov as Tsar, ending the Time of Troubles.

description.zh-cn: 米哈伊尔·罗曼诺夫的即位开启了罗曼诺夫王朝的统治。
description.en: The accession of Michael Romanov marked the beginning of the Romanov dynasty's rule.

relationships.target: 阿列克谢·米哈伊洛维奇·罗曼诺夫

description.zh-cn: 乌克兰领袖博格丹·赫梅利尼茨基寻求沙皇阿列克谢一世的保护，希望乌克兰能并入俄罗斯。
description.en: Ukrainian leader Bohdan Khmelnytsky sought the protection of Tsar Aleksey I, hoping for Ukraine to be incorporated into Russia.

description.zh-cn: 《佩列亚斯拉夫条约》的签订导致了俄罗斯与波兰之间为争夺乌克兰控制权的战争。
description.en: The signing of the Treaty of Pereyaslav led to the Russo-Polish War over control of Ukraine.

description.zh-cn: 在俄波战争（1654-1667）中，俄罗斯沙皇国击败了波兰。
description.en: The Tsardom of Russia defeated Poland in the Russo-Polish War (1654-1667).

relationships.target: 叶尔马克·齐莫菲叶维奇

description.zh-cn: 1581年，商人斯特罗加诺夫家族招聘哥萨克领袖叶尔马克，资助其向西伯利亚进攻。
description.en: In 1581, the merchant Stroganov family hired the Cossack leader Yermak, financing his expedition into Siberia.

relationships.source: 叶尔马克·齐莫菲叶维奇

description.zh-cn: 叶尔马克率领的哥萨克队伍打败了西伯利亚汗国，为俄罗斯征服西伯利亚打开了通道。
description.en: Yermak's Cossack forces defeated the Khanate of Sibir, opening the way for the Russian conquest of Siberia.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯在向东扩张的过程中吞并了衰退中的瓦剌汗国。
description.en: During its eastward expansion, Russia annexed the declining Oirat Khanate.

description.zh-cn: 在1689年《尼布楚条约》签订前，俄罗斯沙皇国与清朝在黑龙江流域存在冲突。
description.en: Before the signing of the Treaty of Nerchinsk in 1689, the Tsardom of Russia and the Qing dynasty were in conflict in the Amur River basin.

description.zh-cn: 康熙皇帝代表清朝与俄罗斯沙皇国签署了《尼布楚条约》。
description.en: The Kangxi Emperor signed the Treaty of Nerchinsk with the Tsardom of Russia on behalf of the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 根据《尼布楚条约》，清朝（中国）收复了黑龙江以南的领土。
description.en: According to the Treaty of Nerchinsk, the Qing dynasty (China) regained territory south of the Amur River.

description.zh-cn: 根据《尼布楚条约》，贝加尔湖以东地区划归俄罗斯所有。
description.en: According to the Treaty of Nerchinsk, the territory east of Lake Baikal was ceded to Russia.
